messages.subject: Re: math/puzzle books
messages.msgSnippet: We get Mathmania,  also by highlites,  my 9 yo LOVES this!!  We ve received it since she was about 7.5.  I love it also... :-) Spider is another  *FAVE* at our
messages.messageBody:
We get Mathmania, also by highlites, my 9 yo LOVES this!! We've received
it since she was about 7.5. I love it also... :-)
Spider is another *FAVE* at our house - it's literary; but I've
noticed they're starting a new line of magazines for science and
history....thinking the sci one may have some math/logic stuff.
Suz
>
> My son has been receiving Highlites magazine (gift sub from my mom) but
has
> decided that he'd rather get something like Puzzlemania - has anyone ever
> heard of this as a subscription, and if so, do you have any links or a ph#
> where I can get more info?
>
> Or do you have any other magazine suggestions for a 7yo boy?
>
> Thanks!
>
> ...Lizz in Iowa
>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
